pr_title: fix: Workaround to avoid NPE during chart gen. [DHIS2-8803]

timeline.message:
fix: Workaround to avoid NPE during chart gen. [DHIS2-8803]

This fix is the same done for the issue DHIS2-8590]. Not all visualizations have categories

timeline.bodyText: In DHIS2, you can also use ObjectUtils.firstNonNull for selecting a non-null object
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio
